## hasErrorCustom() function

Gets indication whether controls have errors, with custom indication of submitted

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hasErrorCustom(form: NgForm | FormGroup, controls: string[], submitted?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  form | <code>NgForm &#124; FormGroup</code> | Form containing controls |
|  controls | <code>string[]</code> | Array of controls names to be checked for errors |
|  submitted | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether form was submitted |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
